metadata.title: CVE-2019-0160 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Buffer overflow in system firmware for EDK II may allow unauthenticateduser to potentially enable escalation of privilege and/or denial of servicevia network access.

criterions.comment: edk2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
